name: SALIBA ACTION STRATEGIES (ON BEHALF OF ISLAMIC RELIEF WORLDWIDE)
sampleDescriptions: Educating Executive Branch officials on IRW's humanitarian and disaster relief efforts, including assistance to farmers, development of safe water supplies, and proper nutrition for pregnant women.  I
